summary: a tall argonian that can follow u free of charge he uses a bow for long range and haves fire breath for close range he will star burning da hell out of them if they get close enough
descriptionHtml: this character is better use on master difficulty and mods that makes the game a lot harder like http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16421 also is best just having him follow u, i think u can maybe just have one more follower with u but no summers it looks like when a creature is summed and gets hit by my character\'s fire breath it will star attacking him back not sure if theres away to fix that, i only use one follower so this character is best for those who like to have 1 or 2 followers                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               LOCATION in dragonsreach                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           REQUIREMENTS if u want him to look like in the images they are (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/981)  (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17339)  (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6239) and i think you will need this one as well http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
author: JXR07
